io.pravega.common.concurrent

Class ServiceShutdownListener

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.google.common.util.concurrent.Service.Listener
      • io.pravega.common.concurrent.ServiceShutdownListener

  • public class ServiceShutdownListener
extends com.google.common.util.concurrent.Service.Listener
    Service Listeners that invokes callbacks when the monitored service terminates or fails.

    • Constructor Summary

      ServiceShutdownListener(java.lang.Runnable terminatedCallback, java.util.function.Consumer<java.lang.Throwable> failureCallback)

    • Constructor Detail

      • ServiceShutdownListener

        public ServiceShutdownListener(java.lang.Runnable terminatedCallback,
                               java.util.function.Consumer<java.lang.Throwable> failureCallback)
        Creates a new instance of the ServiceShutdownListener class.
        Parameters:
        terminatedCallback - An optional callback that will be invoked when the monitored service terminates.
        failureCallback - An optional callback that will be invoked when the monitored service fails. The argument to this callback is the exception that caused the service to fail.

      • awaitShutdown

        public static void awaitShutdown(com.google.common.util.concurrent.Service service,
                                 boolean throwIfFailed)
        Awaits for the given Service to shut down, whether normally or exceptionally.
        Parameters:
        service - The store to monitor.
        throwIfFailed - Throw the resulting exception if the store ended up in a FAILED state.

      • awaitShutdown

        public static void awaitShutdown(com.google.common.util.concurrent.Service service,
                                 java.time.Duration timeout,
                                 boolean throwIfFailed)
                          throws java.util.concurrent.TimeoutException
        Awaits for the given Service to shut down, whether normally or exceptionally.
        Parameters:
        service - The store to monitor.
        timeout - The maximum amount of time to wait for the shutdown.
        throwIfFailed - Throw the resulting exception if the store ended up in a FAILED state.
        Throws:
        java.util.concurrent.TimeoutException - If the store did not shut down within the specified amount of time. This exception is thrown regardless of the value passed in as throwIfFailed.

      • awaitShutdown

        public static <T extends com.google.common.util.concurrent.Service> void awaitShutdown(java.util.Collection<T> services,
                                                                                       boolean throwIfFailed)
        Awaits for the given Services to shut down, whether normally or exceptionally.
        Type Parameters:
        T - The type of the Collection's elements.
        Parameters:
        services - The services to monitor.
        throwIfFailed - Throw an IllegalStateException if any of the services ended up in a FAILED state.

      • awaitShutdown

        public static <T extends com.google.common.util.concurrent.Service> void awaitShutdown(java.util.Collection<T> services,
                                                                                       java.time.Duration timeout,
                                                                                       boolean throwIfFailed)
                                                                                throws java.util.concurrent.TimeoutException
        Awaits for the given Services to shut down, whether normally or exceptionally.
        Type Parameters:
        T - The type of the Collection's elements.
        Parameters:
        services - The services to monitor.
        timeout - Timeout for the operation.
        throwIfFailed - Throw an IllegalStateException if any of the services ended up in a FAILED state.
        Throws:
        java.util.concurrent.TimeoutException - If the store did not shut down within the specified amount of time. This exception is thrown regardless of the value passed in as throwIfFailed.
